amendment.description: To provide in the deficit-neutral reserve fund for America's veterans and wounded servicemembers and for a Post 9/11 GI bill for access of rural veterans to health care and other services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4286 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2066) To provide in the deficit-neutral reserve fund for America's veterans and wounded servicemembers and for a Post 9/11 GI bill for access of rural veterans to health care and other services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4286 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Klobuchar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
